subject: Greetings,
body:
Greetings,
First, we introduce this commission (INTERPOL) International Police. We fight cyber crime, internet fraud, scam and money laundering in Africa, London, United States, Europe and Asian region. Our commission has been in existence since 2002 and our duty is to stop internet fraud. We have over 11,500 fraudsters in our Central prisons around UK, Asia and we are still on the lookout for more. We are aware that a lot of foreigners have been deceived and huge amounts of money have been lost to them.
The Leaders of the UN  Crime Fighters, have come together to inform the World what is going on and we have recovered over $422 Million Dollars (Four Hundred and Twenty two Million Dollars) from the people we have apprehended. Your reference (Email: id) was given to us by one of the fraudsters in our detention room after a serious investigation and our aim is to refund all the lost funds to it's legitimate owners.
The UN has approved a total of One Million US Dollars only (US $1000,000.00), as compensation to the loss that you incurred as this was a ceiling rate. Some suffered more while others suffered less and the idea is to restore back to the position that you would have been if not defrauded.
In addition to the compensation amount approved in your favor is Two Million Five Hundred Thousand US Dollars only (US $2,500,000.00), making it a total of Three Million Five Hundred Thousand US Dollars. This will be paid to you in the next few days.
We still seek for others who feel they are wise and hope that you will be of assistance by giving us more information as per clue in apprehending them. The UN has issued instructions that foreign payment should be via ATM Master Card only and no representative(s) will be accepted in order to avoid diversion of beneficiary's funds into their private account.
We do hereby ask you to contact this office immediately with your personal data such as, Full name & address, country of origin, Company's name and position (if any), Present occupation, Mobile/phone number for easier communication and ratification to redeem your compensation.
Regards
INSPECTOR MICHAEL A. HUGHE
INTERPOL & SCAM VICTIMS
NB: (confidential) if this email is received accidentally and you are not a scam victim, please Ignore and do not respond.

subject: Re: Greetings,
body:
Hello Inspector Michael A. Hughe,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this important information. It's truly commendable what the INTERPOL Police is doing to fight cyber crime, internet fraud, and money laundering. I'm glad to hear that so many fraudsters have been apprehended and that a significant amount of money has been recovered.

I'm curious about the process of refunding the lost funds to their legitimate owners. How does it work? And how did my reference Email id end up with one of the fraudsters in your detention room?

Also, could you please elaborate on why the UN has decided that foreign payment should be via ATM Master Card only? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Millard
